pages.title: Enchantment Infusion
pages.text: $(br)$(key)Enchantment Infusion$() is a way to perform $(bold)directed enchanting$() and $(bold)item crafting$().$(br2)Its core blocks are the $(key)Enchantment Infusion Table$() and $(key)Enchantment Infusion Pedestal$().$(br2)$(bold)Right-click$() with an item to place it, and $(bold)right-click with an empty hand$() to take it out.

pages.title: Directed Enchanting
pages.text: $(br)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on the $(key)Enchantment Infusion Table$() or $(key)Enchantment Infusion Pedestal$() to see all recipes.$(br2)Place the required ingredients on the $(key)Enchantment Infusion Pedestals$() (order doesn't matter). Finally, place the item you want to enchant on the center $(key)Enchantment Infusion Table$() (its existing enchantment level must be $(bold)at least$() the recipe requirement). Wait a few seconds and the infusion will complete.

pages.title: Crafting Items
pages.text: $(br)Besides $(bold)directed enchanting$(), $(key)Enchantment Infusion$() can also craft most $(mage/scroll)spell scrolls$() and some special items.$(br2)Crafting items via $(key)Enchantment Infusion$() works the same way as $(bold)directed enchanting$().
